name: Block of Time
description:
Block of Time

My submission for Mini Jam 112: Chrono, with the limitation of 'Only 3 Buttons'!

You take control of a block that has only 3 abilities: jumping, stopping time, and travelling backwards in time!

Each level offers a new combination of obstacles that you'll have to figure out how to proceed with only using your three abilities.

Controls
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Stop Time
  • C - Travel back in time
Credit

Programming and artwork done by myself

Background image - https://wallpaperaccess.com/pixel-space

Sound Effects + Music - https://zapsplat.com
